nodes.text: Grophets were an omnivorous species of quadrupeds native to the planet Rishi that were known for their stubbornness and intelligence. Because of their dislike of pens and cages, grophet were highly difficult to domesticate. These creatures used their sensitive hearing, body mass, and nodule-packed foreheads to protect themselves from predators. The grophet were highly sought after by game hunters, as the animals' entrails were considered a delicacy among the Hutts.
